results.content:
Viele Details sind schwer nachzubauen. Habe mich an die Firma des Dozenten gewendet und erhalten seit 4 Wochen keinen Support (habe angeboten 130 EUR für eine Support Stunde zu erhalten - kein Glück). 

Sucht euch einen Dozenten der erreichbar ist oder Support bietet. Bei Jonas Schindler werdet ihr komplett alleine gelassen.

results.content: Very self explanatory. I like what I see. Ican'twaittogetstarted.
results.content_html: Very self explanatory. I like what I see. Ican'twaittogetstarted.

results.content: Overall it is a very good practical wp course. A beautiful and realistic site was used in the teaching. My only small complaint is that this training is based on a premium theme zephyr and some part of the training would become irrelevant if you are not using the same theme. It would be nice if it is mentioned upfront in the course description/requirement that a premium theme is required for the training so that people can have a choice. However, zephyr is indeed a very good theme.
results.content_html: Overall it is a very good practical wp course. A beautiful and realistic site was used in the teaching. My only small complaint is that this training is based on a premium theme zephyr and some part of the training would become irrelevant if you are not using the same theme. It would be nice if it is mentioned upfront in the course description/requirement that a premium theme is required for the training so that people can have a choice. However, zephyr is indeed a very good theme.

results.content: The instructor is knowledgeable and shows you everything you need to create an amazing website frontend. Video and audio quality is very good. Jonas introduces few tools like visual composer and slider revolution, which will make the front-end developer life easier. WordPress is an addon to my PHP experience and I am confident to develop a WordPress sites.
results.content_html: The instructor is knowledgeable and shows you everything you need to create an amazing website frontend. Video and audio quality is very good. Jonas introduces few tools like visual composer and slider revolution, which will make the front-end developer life easier. WordPress is an addon to my PHP experience and I am confident to develop a WordPress sites.

results.content: This presentation moves very fast -- too quickly, perhaps. It showed me how the author built a webpage using WordPress. I'll have to go somewhere else to find out how I could use WordPress to build something of my own. The section on SEO at the end was quite clear and useful.
results.content_html: This presentation moves very fast -- too quickly, perhaps. It showed me how the author built a webpage using WordPress. I'll have to go somewhere else to find out how I could use WordPress to build something of my own. The section on SEO at the end was quite clear and useful.

results.content: Super Kurs für eine tolle Website. Ich hätte mir aber noch mehr Zusatzinfos zu Funktionen und Möglichkeiten gewünscht. Je mehr erklärt wird, umso besser versteht man schließlich auch alle Zusammenhänge.
results.content_html: Super Kurs für eine tolle Website. Ich hätte mir aber noch mehr Zusatzinfos zu Funktionen und Möglichkeiten gewünscht. Je mehr erklärt wird, umso besser versteht man schließlich auch alle Zusammenhänge.

results.content: The course Zephyr Theme does not relevant to what I am using now. I can 4 rated stars for the SEO topics

results.content: This course brings you from zero knowledge to at least 80% in website development! Once you finished this course you can set up an astonishing looking website. Yes, you need to make some investment, but the potential outcome of a great website is endless! :) Thank you

results.content: I haven't watched the entire video, however, I enjoyed listening to the presenter speak about why you should use Wordpress, how to set up web hosting and then covers installation and set up.  Thanks for the course!
results.content_html: I haven't watched the entire video, however, I enjoyed listening to the presenter speak about why you should use Wordpress, how to set up web hosting and then covers installation and set up. Thanks for the course!
